title: Wine Tasting Night
description: Experience our finest local wine selection paired with artisanal cheeses.
lm_desc: Sample a curated selection of wines from regional vineyards, expertly paired with locally sourced cheeses and gourmet accompaniments. Enjoy the ambiance of our outdoor patio with live background music.

title: Farmers Market Brunch
description: Sunday brunch featuring fresh ingredients from local producers.
lm_desc: Treat yourself to a wholesome brunch made from seasonal produce. This event features local vendors, organic options, and handcrafted beverages in a vibrant market atmosphere.

title: Live Jazz Evening
description: Smooth jazz performances while you enjoy our seasonal menu.
lm_desc: Relax to the sounds of live jazz performed by talented local artists. Enjoy an intimate evening with our rotating seasonal menu and expertly crafted cocktails.

title: Chef's Table Experience
description: Exclusive multi-course dinner prepared right before your eyes.
lm_desc: Join our head chef for a private dining experience featuring a multi-course tasting menu. Each dish is prepared and plated tableside with wine pairings and behind-the-scenes insights.

title: Summer Garden Picnic
description: Enjoy a curated picnic basket in our beautiful garden setting.
lm_desc: Pre-order a gourmet picnic basket and enjoy a sunny afternoon in our flower-filled garden. Includes a mix of savory snacks, artisanal sandwiches, desserts, and refreshing beverages.

title: Sunset Acoustic Night
description: Live acoustic music on the patio as the sun sets.
lm_desc: Watch the sunset while listening to acoustic sets from local singer-songwriters. A great evening to unwind with our special patio menu and a glass of wine or craft beer.

title: Salsa Dance Party
description: Join us for an evening of salsa dancing and themed cocktails.
lm_desc: Spice up your night with energetic salsa rhythms and signature Latin cocktails. Beginners welcome—an instructor will be on-site to guide the steps before the dance floor opens up.

title: Local Art & Wine Test
description: Browse local artwork while sipping on premium wines.
lm_desc: Celebrate creativity with an open gallery night featuring local artists and handcrafted wines. Mingle with the creators, discover new art, and enjoy a casual yet cultured evening.
